title: Pasta with ratatouille
directions: In a bowl mix mushrooms, aubergine, pepper, rosemary, 2 tbsp olive oil.
Put it on a baking tray and bake for 20 mins or until the veggies are soft.
Heat rest of the oil in a pan, add onion and fry for 8 mins or until it is soft.
Add garlic and fry for 2 more mins.
Add tomatoes and cook for 10 mins until it thickens, stirring occasionally.
While the sauce is cooking, cook the pasta.
Add the veggies and basil to the sauce, stirring occasionally.
Serve the sauce on pasta with shaved parmesan on top.
